mapper.select: select lxcode as id,lxname||lxcode||'('||'K'||szhh||'-'||'K'||ezhh||')' as text from htgl_lxb order by lxcode

select ldcode as id,ldname as text,lxcode,szhh,ezhh,bmCode from htgl_ldb
where bmcode=#{bmCode}
where bmcode like substr(#{bmCode},0,length(#{bmCode})-2)||'__'
order by lxcode

select ldcode as id,ldname as text,lxcode,szhh,ezhh,bmCode from htgl_ldb
where bmcode=#{bmCode}
where bmcode like substr(#{bmCode},0,length(#{bmCode})-2)||'__'
and ldcode in ( select distinct ldcode from rcyh_wxzyjlb where yszt = '0' and zysbzt = '1' ) order by lxcode

select ldcode as id,ldname as text,lxcode,szhh,ezhh,bmCode from htgl_ldb
where bmcode = #{bmCode}
where bmcode like substr(#{bmCode},0,length(#{bmCode})-2)||'__'
and ldcode in ( select distinct ldcode from rcyh_wxzyjlb where yszt = '0' and zysbzt = '1' ) order by lxcode
select bmlx from htgl_bmb where bmCode=#{bmCode}
